scripts.postversion: npm run build-docs && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --recursive --compilers js:babel-register -R spec src/test/* src/modules/**/test/*
scripts.build-docs: export NAME=`npm view . name`; export VERSION=`npm view . version`; documentation readme ./src/index.js ./src/modules/*/*.js --name $NAME --project-version $VERSION --readme-file ./README.md -s $NAME
scripts.publish-docs: npm run build-docs && git add ./README.md && git commit -m 'Updated README API Docs' && git push
